# Visualize targets

Run code in buildBook.R to update targets and run quarto_render()

```{r include=FALSE}
#knitr::opts_chunk$set(message = FALSE, warning = FALSE)
```

```{r getVizTargetsOptions, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(message = FALSE, warning = FALSE)
```


Data processing and model running is controlled by `targets`. Targets are only re-run if the upstream data source changes

```{r, warning=FALSE}
library(targets)
library(tarchetypes)
library(visNetwork)
```

Visualize the targets network

```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
#tar_visnetwork()
```
